Name: Juliana Ferreira
Description:
Juliana's decomposing body was found lying in a sugar cane field late on the afternoon of Tuesday 2nd October.

> The body of a [trans woman] was found by factory workers at a Mandaguaçu sugarcane plantation in the Maringá region on Tuesday afternoon. The Civil Police reported that the corpse was in an advanced degree of decomposition. 
>
> The victim was [female], but wore women's clothing. This is [deadname] Ferreira de Freitas, 24 years old.
>
> Next to the body the police found a cell phone. The police investigate execution hypothesis. Teams of technical expertise were at the scene.
>
> Police said officials working at the site smelled strongly around the body where they were found and called the emergency services. The body was sent to the Legal Medical Institute (IML). Investigators did not confirm whether the victim had marks of gunfire or other injuries.
>
> According to family members [deadname] was a [trans woman], lived in the district of Iguatemi, and was known as Juliana Ferreira. Now with the identification of the victim, the Homicide Police has already begun investigations to reach the perpetrators or perpetrator. The victim may have been stabbed to death.

https://homofobiamata.wordpress.com/2018/10/02/309-juliana-ferreira-22-anos/

http://radardanoticia.com.br/2018/10/03/travesti-e-encontrada-morta-em-canavial-de-iguatemi/

https://web.archive.org/web/20181015021624/http://www.marechalnews.com.br:80/policial/travesti-e-encontrada-morta-em-canavial-em-mandaguacu/

https://www.plantaomaringa.com/noticias/1520/travesti-e-encontrada-morta-em-canavial-de-mandaguacu-diz-policia/

https://umuarama.portaldacidade.com/noticias/policial/travesti-e-encontrada-morta-em-canavial-na-regiao-de-maringa

http://www.goionews.com.br/noticia/2018/10/05/3587/policia-identifica-corpo-de-travesti-encontrado-em-canavial/84378/ [BROKEN LINK]
Tweet:
Juliana Ferreira's decomposing body was found lying in a sugar cane field in Mandaguaçu, Paraná (Brazil) on 2 Oct 2018. A stone was found next to her body.

She was 22. #SayHerName #TransLivesMatter #TDoR

Name: Ciara Minaj Carter Frazier
Description:
Ciara was stabbed multiple times by a man after an argument late on Wednesday 3rd October in the West Garfield Park neighborhood. She died at the scene.

> A transgender woman who was found dead with stab wounds late Wednesday in the West Garfield Park neighborhood is believed to have been killed by a person she was arguing with, according to a statement from Chicago police.
> 
> At 9:28 p.m., the 31-year-old was with a male inside an abandoned building in the 4500 block of West Adams, police said. As a disagreement between them flared up, he proceeded to stab her and then leave her body in the backyard of the building.

Monica Roberts of Transgriot wrote this about her murder:

> "The Chicago Sun Times story I based this post on is being accused of leaving out some disturbing details that I'm hearing about from local trans advocates and people who knew Ciara.  
> 
> "They allege that the perpetrator mutilated her body by cutting off her genitalia, and the body was nude when it was discovered. Those missing details, if confirmed, escalate Ciara's murder to a hate crime.
> 
> "It also fits into the excessive violence beyond lethality pattern that we know is a part of the profile of murders of trans women.
> 
> "Her murder is being investigated by Chicago PD Area North detectives.
> 
> "Frazier was well known in Chicago's ballroom community, and she was the second trans person to die in the city in less than a month. She is also the 16th Black trans person to die in the US in 2018. "

https://pantagraph.com/news/state-and-regional/crime-and-courts/in-chicago-killings-of-transgender-women-of-color-often-go-unsolved/article_b1ee23ae-f8c9-11ec-9fbd-831f408380b8.html

https://transgriot.blogspot.com/2018/10/number-22-rest-in-power-and-peace-ciara.html

https://mic.com/articles/191778/ciara-minaj-carter-frazier-a-transgender-woman-was-found-fatally-stabbed-in-chicago#.AUBuPVIvJ

https://www.gaystarnews.com/article/another-transgender-woman-stabbed-to-death-in-chicago/

https://www.pinknews.co.uk/2018/10/05/transgender-woman-stabbed-to-death-in-chicago/

https://chicago.suntimes.com/?post_type=cst_article&p=1403408
Tweet:
Ciara Minaj Carter Frazier was stabbed by a man after an argument late on 3 Oct 2018 in the West Garfield Park neighborhood of Chicago, Illinois (USA). She died at the scene.

She was 31. #SayHerName #TransLivesMatter #TDoR

Name: M. García
Description:
M. died in hospital just under a fortnight after undergoing a silicone filler injection on 20th September.

> A 26-year-old [trans woman] identified as [deadname] García, of Venezuelan nationality, and who was part of the LGTBI community, died [in hospital] in the last few hours, due to the injuries she sustained to her body as a result of a bad cosmetic procedure on 20th September.
>
> Next to her were two other young people had arrived in poor health after having silicone injected to lift their buttocks. This procedure was also what led to the death of the young Venezuelan.
>
> It was assumed that this product could be used to increase glutes, breasts and lips. Another victim is still in a delicate state of health, because this injected substance has destroyed or decomposed muscles at each injection site.
>
> The victim was transsexual and it was a third party who sold them the product of aesthetic beauty that "did wonders", but they never expected to be deceived by people who play with the health of people, without caring at risk the lives of their customers.

http://hsbnoticias.com/noticias/judicial/buscando-belleza-eterna-se-inyecto-la-muerte-escalofriante-f-466302

http://boyaca.extra.com.co/noticias/judicial/buscando-belleza-eterna-se-inyecto-la-muerte-escalofriante-f-466302

http://bucaramanga.extra.com.co/noticias/judicial/buscando-belleza-eterna-se-inyecto-la-muerte-escalofriante-f-466302
Tweet:
M. García died as a result of complications caused by a cosmetic filler injection in Villavicencio, Meta (Colombia) on 3 Oct 2018.

She was 26. #SayHerName #TransLivesMatter #TDoR

Name: Name Unknown
Description:
The victim´s body was found hanged. After they had killed her murderers had tried to burn her body.

> The Justice of Rosario its trying to identify the corpse of a [trans woman] who would have been hanged before being set on fire a few meters from the building where the Criminal Justice Center of Rosario operates, and the place where the narco gang "The Monkeys" was convicted last April.
>
> The case is investigated so far as a transvesticide, according to Clarín sources confirmed by the Public Ministry of the Accusation. There is likely no connection with the case of the narco gang.
>
> The victim was found minutes before noon in an open field located next to the railroad Belgrano Cargas. The [trans woman] had a handkerchief around her neck and wounds to her face.
>
> The body was on a mattress and covered with wood, papers and fabrics with which her killers was tried to burn it. As a result her lower extremities were burnt.
>
> The scene [of the crime] adjoins the wall of a parking lot. The researchers estimated that [the victim] could have been between 45 and 50 years old.

http://www.nuevodiarioweb.com.ar/noticias/2018/10/05/170785-horror-hallaron-muerta-ahorcada-y-con-las-piernas-quemadas-a-una-transexual

https://www.clarin.com/policiales/misterio-encuentran-cadaver-alrededores-centro-justicia-penal-rosario_0__b3JGOHUm.html

http://agenciapresentes.org/2018/10/04/rosario-hallaron-un-cuerpo-e-investigan-si-fue-un-travesticidio/


https://www.ellitoral.com/index.php/id_um/180553-hallaron-muerta-con-quemaduras-a-una- mujer-trans-en-rosario-el-cuerpo-tenia-signos-de-ahorcamiento-sucesos.html

https://www.cronica.com.ar/policiales/Encuentran-quemada-y-ahorcada-a-mujer-trans-en-Rosario--20181004-0106.html
Tweet:
An unidentified #trans woman was strangled and suffocated in Rosario, Santa Fe (Argentina) on 5 Oct 2018.

She was 50. #SayHerName #TransLivesMatter #TDoR

Name: Gabriela Ramos Menezes
Description:
Gabriela's body was found on the beach of Ponta Negra in the West Zone of Manaus. Her face was disfigured and her eyes were missing.

The official cause of death was drowning, but her family says she was killed.

> The pictures are shocking. Found without eyes and with a disfigured face, the body of the trans woman was found on the beach of Ponta Negra, West Zone of Manaus, last Sunday (7). Preliminary examination of the Medical Legal Institute (IML) indicates that the death was by drowning, however, family members contest this.
> 
> "A lot of stories began to appear. That she walked with people who are not well-regarded. We think she did not die drowned, but out of envy or homophobia, "said the aunt of the victim, Thainara Sales, 26.
> 
> Thainara states that the family's acceptance of the transsexuality of the victim was great, and that she has been welcomed from birth. "When my sister joined her father, she came over a lot. From the moment she transitioned, she was always welcomed. Our love was enormous."

https://homofobiamata.wordpress.com/2018/10/07/g-r-menezes-19-anos/

https://www.acritica.com/channels/manaus/news/familia-contesta-afogamento-de-travesti-achada-sem-olhos-na-ponta-negra

https://www.facebook.com/IOLNOTICIAS/posts/2186054541679188
Tweet:
Gabrielal Ramos Menezes was found dead on a beach in Manaus, Amazonas (Brazil) on 7 Oct 2018. Her eyes were missing.

She was 19 and was in the process of transitioning. #SayHerName #TransLivesMatter #TDoR

Name: Itzel Aidana Ávila
Description:
Itzel died by suicide several days after publishing a viral video admonishing Lupita Jones for speaking out against the participation of trans women in the Miss Universe contest.

> "Just let me tell you one thing, Mrs. Lupita Jones, it takes a lot of courage, it takes a lot of strength and a lot of character to be able to be that person with whom you identify yourself. Thank God that she were born with a part between her legs that identified with with her personality, unfortunately we do not, but that does not make us less than anyone.
> 
> "Please, look very closely at what she says, because thanks to those thoughts, thanks to these opinions, many people commit suicide, many people feel rejected and humiliated, many people are suffering in the flesh, live the hell of being in a body that does not it belongs.
> 
> "I invite her to know us a little bit more and she will realize that each of us has something in common: discrimination, rejection, transphobia, all those people who come to mock us and even close doors even to us. Jobs, government institutions, many things that we are entitled to as human beings. No one has the moral quality to judge whether a trans person is a woman or not.
> 
> "What a pity that we have such great representatives with such mediocre mentalities."

Itzel's Facebook profile is https://www.facebook.com/itzel.avila.338863.

https://www.sdpnoticias.com/gay/2018/10/09/despiden-a-itzel-aidana-en-zacatecas-ella-se-fue-como-queria-de-blanco-con-muchas-flores

https://www.eluniversal.com.mx/estados/investigan-muerte-de-transexual-que-envio-mensaje-lupita-jones

http://www.e-consulta.com/nota/2018-10-08/espectaculos/transexual-se-suicida-tras-mandarle-mensaje-lupita-jones

https://www.eluniversal.com.mx/espectaculos/una-mujer-jamas-sera-igual-un-transgenero-lupita-jones

https://www.facebook.com/itzel.avila.338863/videos/169803107261026/
Tweet:
Itzel Aidana Ávila died by suicide in Fresnillo, Zacatecas (Mexico) on 7 Oct 2018.

She was 33. #SayHerName #TransLivesMatter #TDoR

Description:
Monse was shot from a passing vehicle on the bridge of Plaza Sendero at around 3:30am on Sunday 7th October. She died in hospital.

Name: Regina Denise Brown ("Gina")
Description:
Regina was found dead in her home after an arson attack on 10th October.

Her body was found by firefighers after a passerby called the fire department after seeing a fire in Brown’s home.

> Regina Denise Brown, from Orangeburg, was 53 years old and worked as a licensed cosmetologist, a person claiming to be in a relationship with the woman told PinkNews.
> 
> “She always was smiling and happy. She always gave encouragement to the younger trans women always highlighting our best features and strong traits. Just an all around great lady with a big heart. She was a very amazing talented big hearted lady,” the person said in an email.
> 
> Brown, also known as Gina to her friends, was mourned also mourned by her loved ones on Facebook. “Lost for words, my buddy, my best friend, my beautiful sis, always called me star or boo… Real kind hearted & genuine friend of mines…. Star loves you, & will always remember the good times we had… May you RIP God’s angel…… Gina,” one post in her memory read.

Kenneth Lamont Jenkins, 37, was arrested in connection with the fire and charged with murder on 7th November. He was an ex-convict who had previously served 18 years in prison for armed robbery and possession of a stolen vehicle.

https://transgriot.blogspot.com/2018/12/number-25-rest-in-power-and-peace.html

https://www.pinknews.co.uk/2018/12/12/transgender-woman-regina-denise-brown-murder/

https://thetandd.com/news/local/crime-and-courts/body-found-in-burned-home-in-orangeburg-man-facing-arson/article_28c42ccf-2cc1-56bb-9322-f701cd468f53.html

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lM4N9EKKFpE

Regina Denise Brown ("Gina") was found dead in her home after an arson attack in Orangeburg, South Carolina (USA) on 10 Oct 2018.

She was 53. #SayHerName #TransLivesMatter #TDoR

Name: Name Unknown
Description:
The victim died by suicide in her yard on Rio Nazas Street. Her body was found after friends went looking for her.

Note that although the media reported them as "a male who practiced transvestism" they were probably a trans woman.

> A person of 32 years, decided to take their own life by hanging themself inside their home in the San Manuel neighborhood. It Although in the house they found a posthumous letter, their motivations to take this irreversible step were not disclosed.
>
> It was around six o'clock in the afternoon of this Thursday, when some acquaintances went to the address on calle Rio Nazas. Upon entering they discovered that the [woman] was dead.

Name: Pitielly Edleuza Prado
Description:
Pitielly was a hairdresser. She was found stabbed with a pair of scissors inside her home on the morning of Saturday 13th October.

The previous night she had been out to a party with friends. After they had returned home she had gone on alone to another bar.

> "She was a very dear person, everyone liked her here. She attended a committee of the neighborhood residents' association because she was very right with her things here. What do you think might have happened? I can not imagine anything at all, it's a mystery because she had no enemies. She was so happy yesterday at the party, making plans. Something must have happened after we left her, because she left us on a good note."

Her Facebook profile is https://www.facebook.com/pitiely.edleuza.

https://homofobiamata.wordpress.com/2018/10/13/pitiele-prado-cabeleireira-52-anos-dhpp/

Name: Marisa Sánchez ("Haitianita")
Description:
Marisa was found dead with head trauma on avenida Barceló in Punta Cana. A bloodied stone and a condom were found near her body.

It was presumed that she was killed by a client she had been seen with earlier. In March 2019 police arrested Jesus Santana Marte, 25, for her murder and that of [Jéssica Bracamonte](https://tdor.translivesmatter.info/reports/2018/12/23/jessica-bracamonte_veron-punta-cana-higuey-dominican-republic_0a44ab74) in December 2018.

https://transsa.org/2018/10/16/asesinan-mujer-trans-de-nacionalidad-haitiana-en-punta-cana/

https://www.cdn.com.do/2018/10/15/encuentran-muerto-travesti-punta-cana/

Marisa Sánchez ("Haitianita") was found dead with head trauma in Punta Cana, Higüey (Dominican Republic). A bloodied stone and a condom were found near her body.

She was 30. #SayHerName #TransLivesMatter #TDoR

Name: Jessica Gonzaga
Description:
Jessica was attacked in front of a bar in Largo do Arouche at around 4:50am by a group of men. A witness reported hearing them screaming abuse and the name "Bolsonaro".

After being stabbed she managed to walk to a nearby hotel where security guards called the emergency services. She was taken to hospital, but died en-route.

Armando Vila Real Filho, 28, was arrested for her murder.

> "She was with four or five men in front of the bar, and from there I began to hear screams, an argument, a fight." They called her various names, verbal assaults, and shouted 'Bolsonaro', "he said.
> 
> The witness reported that the men then fled and she heard the victim asking for help, saying that she "was going to die."

She did not carry identity documents so her full identity was unknown at first. Initial reports identified her as "Priscilla" or "Vanessa" - the former appears to be the name of a witness.

> Nelson Matias Pereira, a founding partner of the NGO APOLGBT (LGBT Pride Parade Association of São Paulo), says that he has contacted other LGBT entities to form a network and identify the victim within ten days, a deadline given by IML ). "We are making a task force with other moves to find someone who knows or identifies [the body]."
> 
> Nelson says he does not even know the name of the victim. "I first heard a lot of Priscilla, then Vanessa."
> 
> According to the Secretariat of Public Security, she did not have any documents on her when she was taken to hospital, and no one claimed her body from the IML [mortuary]. Fingerprinting was not sufficient to discover her identity - which indicates that her documents must have been issued in another state.

https://helciobeuclair.wixsite.com/beuclairpelomundo/single-post/2018/10/26/URGENTE-Travesti-assassinada-na-regi%C3%A3o-do-Arouche-foi-identificada-e-o-assassino-j%C3%A1-se-encontra-preso

A neighbour reported hearing her screaming during the attack while men shouted the name of Brazilian Presidential (then) candidate Jair Bolsonaro. #SayHerName #TransLivesMatter #TDoR

Name: Patricia Aylen Molina
Description:
Patricia and her former partner Victoria Fabro, 22, were both found shot dead in a car. Each had sustained a gunshot wound to the head. Patricia was a police officer.

Their deaths were initially suspected to have been by suicide, but as the murder weapon was not found in the vehicle the case was subsequently investigated as murder.

> Patricia Aylén Molina Dolezal, a transgender officer of the province's police and her alleged ex-partner, a 22-year-old girl identified as Victoria Fabro, were found in the town of Villa Bonich inside a car, covered in blood and each with a shot at the height of the temple.

Patricia had only recently transitioned.

Name: Carol Machado
Description:
Carol was beaten, raped and shot dead  at about 7am on Thursday 18th October. Her body was found on a dirt road.

> "There is no word that absorbs or transcribes our feelings, we die once again! 
> 
> "The LGBT National Union, as well as its municipal fraction of Xanxerê / SC, comes through this to express the eternal mourning, we have violently lost one of ours. Carol Machado, transvestite and warrior was brutally murdered. Our friend was beaten and raped in every way, had her body shot through and then discarded somewhere in the mud, indigent and without humanity.
> 
> "A dismayed ONE understands that Carol's body is our body is the ones we want to reach, and they have hit because Carol is one of us. Carol was the first Secretary General of the National LGBT Union of Xanxerê / SC, Trans woman, disrespectful at all, ALL ways that someone may be disrespected, nor does Carol's death statement carry her true gender identity, and this is very painful, our soul is totally violated. Carol completed that 27-year-old week, recently earned her social name, even with the record in notarial record his name was not respected by local information vehicles. Unfortunately Carol is more of a trans person than endorsing mortality statistics.
> 
> "We no longer know how to make ourselves understood, when we reiterate that discourses of hatred are killing us, yes, they are killing us, knocking at our door and targeting us. Carol enrolled in an institution for adult studies shortly, Carol had dreams.
Carol, was murdered on her birthday, loved and had family, we are part of her, Carol's family of love built, our sense of helplessness, devastation, will not shut us up, we want answers, we want justice."

Name: Laysa Fortuna
Description:
Laysa was attacked in the centre of Aracaju. She died in hospital from her injuries.

> According to witnesses, her attacker was identified as Alex da Silva Cardoso , a street person, who while walking through the area threatened several trans women. He stated that he said that if Jair Bolsonaro (PSL)  was elected president, all trans people would be killed.

On the morning of Saturday 20th October Alex Silva Cardoso, 33, was arrested for her murder.

> Good night. I and all our friends and family and friends are terrified of the death of Laysa Fortuna, a transgender young woman who could not stand the wounds of a monster. The pain is very great, because it was a friend dear to all, who had a life ahead. 
> 
> You were snatched from this world in the worst possible way. Whatever you do with this killer, it will never bring us back to us, it stays in our memories, your tenderness, your charm, your smile and above all YOU. May God receive you with your immense glory, for you will always be in our memories. We are all devastated. ETERNAL MOURNING

Laysa herself had expressed fear about what would happen if Bolsonaro was elected.

> On social networks friends of Laysa paid their respects. One of her friends said she had witnessed Laysa fearing the election and saying that the vote of many Brazilians contributed to her death.
> 
> "Laysa said on election day: 'Your vote may kill me. I was close to her when this happened. Today she is gone and her murderer spoke the name of Bolsonaro. Do you understand that your vote is unleashing? I swear I'm scared," the message says.

On 12th November 2019 her killer was sentenced to 12 years in prison.

> Accused of the murder of transsexual Laysa Fortuna, a crime that took place in October last year in Aracaju, Alex da Silva Cardoso was sentenced to 12 years in prison in a popular jury on Tuesday morning, 12, at the Gumersindo Bessa Forum in the capital. Sergipe. The victim was hit by a stabbing weapon on the night of October 18 last year in central Aracaju and on Tuesday, the defendant was submitted to a popular jury.

Laysa's Facebook profile is https://www.facebook.com/lala.lima.948.

Name: Ariana Esquivel
Description:
Ariana died by suicide. She was a police officer and was suffering discrimination at work.

> The incident occurred last night, around 9:00 pm, when the officer and two other officers were on board a patrol car carrying out their duties.
> 
> According to the police report, at around 8:15 pm, they stopped to buy food at the San Justo Shopping Mall after which they resumed their tour. While they were traveling through Zapiola in the direction of Peribebuy to Route 3, they noticed that Esquivel had a cell phone on which she was receiving messages.
> 
> Minutes later, the witnesses said they heard an "unexpected explosion" and stopped the car thinking that a tyre had burst, but when they got out they noticed that their partner was injured in the back of the car. Meanwhile, her regulation weapon, a 9 mm pistol, was lying on the floor.
> 
> The officer was immediately rushed to the Solís Clinic in the aforementioned town, where medical attention was given, but unfortunately she died.


> **Suicide of the trans police officer: "Ariana suffered a lot of discrimination in her work"**
> 
> A friend of the officer who committed suicide last night inside a patrol car told that she had been suffering from a great depression because five months ago she had decided to show herself according to his self-perceived gender. The rejection she received would have led her to make that decision.
> 
> Ariana was 24 years old and had worked in the security forces for six years. In the last five months she had decided to show herself as she was and began her transformation, but that, according to her friends, led her to face the rejection of many people.
> 
> "She was not having a good time. She suffered a lot of discrimination at work, she was not well with her family, they were very closed and it was difficult for them to accept her as she was. That led her to feel like she was always wrong, " one of her friends told SN Online.

https://diario-nco.com/la-matanza/la-matanza-la-policia-que-se-suicido/

http://www.snonline.com.ar/una-oficial-se-suicid-dentro-de-un-patrullero-en-pleno-34586

http://www.snonline.com.ar/ariana-sufra-mucha-discriminacin-en-su-trabajo-34591

https://www.facebook.com/larosanaranja.ac/posts/340730339823601

Description:
Karholine was stabbed in the groin and died in hospital. Her killer is reported to have shouted slurs in the name of Presidential candidate Jair Bolsonaro.

> According to Paulo Araújo, Coordinator of the LGBTI + Municipal Forum of São Bernardo and president of the Neon Cunha Citizenship Center, in the current moment of boundless hatred lived in the country, fear is the only feeling that LGBTI + have the freedom to feel. "Karolaynne resided and worked in Industrial. She was a trans woman who, like many others, had her life ended by this delicate moment we are living in Brazil. We have reports of witnesses reporting that the murderers stabbed her shouting loudly "Bolsonaro, Bolsonaro is going to kill a fagot," Araújo said.

Name: Yuri Vanesa Salazar López
Description:
Yuri's body was found on 22nd October. She had been murdered.

> The Colectivo Voz Propia regrets and rejects the murders of Yuri Vanesa Salazar López, a trans woman, found dead on October 22, and Diana Marcela Rojas Oviedo, a woman in street condition, murdered on October 24 in Buga. 
> 
> We see with sadness and indignation that these violent acts are occurring in our city, putting out the life. We must not tolerate violence for any reason or justify it, whatever the cause of it. 
> 
> We ask the authorities that these cases not go unpunished and that actions be taken to protect the entire population. 
> 
‪> [#‎NiUnMinutoDeSilencio‬](https://www.facebook.com/hashtag/niunminutodesilencio?source=feed_text&epa=HASHTAG)

Name: Lorhany Kalarhary
Description:
Lorhany's naked body was found by her mother on the floor of her home. She had been stabbed 9 times.

> Lorhany was a cook at a bar in Querencia. The crime occurred at 3 pm in Bairro Setor F.
> 
> According to the Civil Police, Lorhany was found by her mother, who called for help. The victim was naked, on the floor, and already dead. The police and experts found nine knife piercings throughout the body of the victim.

Samuel Almeida Matos, 19, has been arrested and charged with murder. In testimony, he claimed to have committed the murder on the grounds that he had been deceived by the victim - in other words, he killed her because she was trans.

In July 2022 Matos was sentenced to 14 years and 6 months for Lorany's murder.

> Samuel Almeida de Matos, 23, was sentenced to 14 years and six months in prison for the murder of 29-year-old transsexual [woman] Lorhany Kalarhary. The popular jury took place this Wednesday (13/07), in the Plenary of the City Council. In addition to the crime of murder, Samuel is also responsible for procedural fraud. 

Lorhany's Facebook profile is https://www.facebook.com/nenem.castro.
